mapper.select: select tb_reservation.id as id, tb_user.username as user, tb_site.name as site, DATE_FORMAT(tb_reservation.date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as date, tb_time_slot.time_slot as time, tb_reservation.status as status from tb_reservation left join tb_user on tb_reservation.user = tb_user.openid left join tb_site on tb_reservation.site = tb_site.id left join tb_time_slot on tb_reservation.time_slot = tb_time_slot.id where tb_reservation.status = #{status} order by tb_reservation.date desc

select tb_reservation.id as id, tb_user.username as user, tb_site.name as site, DATE_FORMAT(tb_reservation.date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as date, tb_time_slot.time_slot as time, tb_reservation.status as status from tb_reservation left join tb_user on tb_reservation.user = tb_user.openid left join tb_site on tb_reservation.site = tb_site.id left join tb_time_slot on tb_reservation.time_slot = tb_time_slot.id where tb_reservation.status = '预约成功' and tb_reservation.user = #{userId} limit 1;

SELECT res.id, user.username AS user, site.name AS site, res.date, res.status, time.time_slot AS timeSlot FROM tb_reservation res, tb_time_slot time, tb_user user, tb_site site WHERE res.time_slot = time.id AND res.user = user.openid AND res.site = site.id LIMIT #{start},#{size}
